text: Amit Purohit (10 February 1987 – 10 July 2019) was an Indian film actor. He appeared in several Hindi and Telugu films ==Filmography== * Shobhana 7 Nights * Sammohanam (2018 film) * Aalaap (film) * Pankh (film) * Bijuka ==References== ==External links== * Category:1987 births Category:Indian male film actors Category:Male actors in Hindi cinema Category:Male actors in Telugu cinema Category:2019 deaths
title: Amit Purohit
